job_title: Planned Giving Coordinator in West Palm Beach, FL
pros: The organization does a great job serving a very vital need in providing services for Alzheimer's patients and their caregivers. They have truly raised the bar on how to treat Alzheimer's patients and caregivers.
cons: After twenty years in business, eleven day care centers, and countless families helped, the only thing that stops this organization from moving forward and becoming a natural presence is management afraid to invest in the mission partnered with management personnel that know absolutely nothing about how to hire, manage and treat professionals. All staff are required to punch in, forbidden to take time off during the first six months (even for doctors appointments), can be randomly screened for drug use at any time, are denied funding to do their jobs, and micromanaged to the point of ineffectiveness.
